text: Can Hayri Özkan (born 2 December 1999) is a German footballer who plays as a right back for Danish 1st Division club Næstved BK on loan from Arminia Bielefeld. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:German expatriate footballers Category:German people of Turkish descent Category:Association football midfielders Category:Arminia Bielefeld players Category:Alemannia Aachen players Category:Næstved BK players Category:2. Bundesliga players Category:Regionalliga players Category:German expatriate sportspeople in Denmark Category:Expatriate footballers in Denmark
title: Can Özkan
